channel.title: Portal Gun or Gravity Gun?
channel.description:
Which would you rather have?
The Handheld Portal Device from Portal
Or the Gravity Gun from Half Life 2?
I would go for the portal gun; sure messing with gravity is fun... but fucking with physics and space is even funner.

item.title: Portal Gun or Gravity Gun?
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

gravity gun for sure

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Gun or Gravity Gun?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

The only problem with that though, is if you miss and you happen to hit the ground you’d get some very nasty broken bones.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Gun or Gravity Gun?
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:58, topic:301061”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=397364.msg2962023#msg2962023 date=1253299140]

I’d probably pick a portal gun, fire a portal on the ceiling and directly below on the floor.

That would be awesome! You could fall forever.

That’s exactly what happens in the game. But sometimes the portals aren’t aligned properly, so after a few cycles you stand on the ground.
[/quote]

Trick is to lay a portal on a wall and 1 on the ceiling then run through the one on the wall and fire the opposite portal on the floor as you fall.[/quote]
or just do it normally and keep refiring the ground portal so its directly under you

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Gun or Gravity Gun?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:57, topic:301061”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=397364.msg2961847#msg2961847 date=1253285809]

I’d probably pick a portal gun, fire a portal on the ceiling and directly below on the floor.

That would be awesome! You could fall forever.
[/quote]

That’s exactly what happens in the game. But sometimes the portals aren’t aligned properly, so after a few cycles you stand on the ground.[/quote]

Trick is to lay a portal on a wall and 1 on the ceiling then run through the one on the wall and fire the opposite portal on the floor as you fall.

Read full topic

I’d probably pick a portal gun, fire a portal on the ceiling and directly below on the floor.
[/quote]

That would be awesome! You could fall forever. :)[/quote]

item.title: Portal Gun or Gravity Gun?
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

Portal Gun. Making peep-holes, setting traps for that one person you hate, making peep-holes… I don’t have a problem okay?

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Gun or Gravity Gun?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:52, topic:301061”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=397364.msg2961562#msg2961562 date=1253240770]

grav gun would be fun, say you’re at a soccer game, you could pull the ball away randomly for lulz

Or you could open a portal infront of the two goals as they’re about to score, causing the ball to go into their goal.

no, you have to make it on a surface

The ball rolls on the ground, you make a portal on the ground infront of the ball, it comes out of the other portal. I’m not retarded man.

when you kick into the net, it rarely touches the ground. also how would you choose which direction to make the second portal so that you could control where the ball goes? that wouldnt be possible from far away…
[/quote]
also the momentum would just sort of fire it upwards
ps we could find out on garrys mo[/quote]

Then it falls back down and out the other portal, and repeat.

Read full topic

when you kick into the net, it rarely touches the ground. also how would you choose which direction to make the second portal so that you could control where the ball goes? that wouldnt be possible from far away…[/quote]
